Module pre-requisites can be found [here](https://rawgit.com/andrewcparnell/bio_course/master/Prerequisites.html). All the raw files and code can be found [here](https://github.com/andrewcparnell/bio_course). Click 'Download ZIP' near the top right if you want offline versions of everything. 

Time  | Class
------------- | ----------------------------------------------------
9:30-10:30 | Basics and experimental design [Class 1](https://rawgit.com/andrewcparnell/bio_course/master/slides/class_1_basics/class_1_basics.pdf)
10:30-10:45 | Discussion and coffee 
10:45-11:45 | Regression and classification [Class 2](https://rawgit.com/andrewcparnell/bio_course/master/slides/class_2_reg_class/class_2_reg_class.pdf)
11:45-12:00 | Discussion and break 
12:00-13:00 | Model checking and performance [Class 3](https://rawgit.com/andrewcparnell/bio_course/master/slides/class_3_checks/class_3_checks.pdf)
13:00-14:00 | Lunch
14:00-15:00 | Introduction to Rstudio [Practical 1](https://rawgit.com/andrewcparnell/bio_course/master/practicals/prac_1_intro/prac_1_intro.pdf)
15:00-15:30 | Break
15:30-16:30 | Running models and diagnostics [Practical 2](https://rawgit.com/andrewcparnell/bio_course/master/practicals/prac_2_models/prac_2_models.pdf)
